tool_description: AI Translate API provides fast and precise multilingual translation solutions. With real-time features, language identification, and text-to-speech conversion, effortlessly integrate dependable translation services into your applications. Seamlessly extend your global presence with thorough documentation and extensive language support.
name: AI Translate
title: AI Translate

api_list.name: detect

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Please provide the text for which you want to detect the language.

api_list.name: translate

required_parameters.name: target_lang
required_parameters.description: enter language code of target language ( you can get language code here : https://cloud.google.com/translate/docs/languages)
